title: Customer Onboarding: Generic for all products
description:
Description
  For whom Telekom
who has to fulfill the order of a managed LAN / WiFi service

Business Scope:
The customer will be onboarded in the system with the related data.
Customer onboarding in relevant tools
Reference to Network ID is transferred through all systems.
acceptance_criteria: Customer Onboarding successfully in the system SNow
Customer Onboarding successfully in the system SAP BRIM
Customer Onboarding successfully in the systems: eTTS, PMA-ISEM, eVA
Customer Onboarding succesfully in the systems: Netcracker and Juniper plattform
Reference to Network ID is transferred through all systems.
